recommendations: Megha Wadhwa “I had worked with Lakshay on ‘Project Meraki’ when we were in college.I am impressed by Lakshay’s ability to handle any situation calmly and patiently.He will surely be a valuable asset to any Company.”

Mihika Mathur “Working and learning under Lakshay's leadership has been one of the greatest experiences of my college life. He portrays professionalism and work ethic of the kind I admire, and strive to achieve. He is passionate about the tasks he performs, and it shows in the results. ”
